subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Experts predict O.J. Mayo, who worked out with the Knicks Thursday, will be selected anywhere from third to seventh in the draft, but most do not expect him to fall past the Knicks, who pick sixth.
snippet: Experts predict O.J. Mayo, who worked out with the Knicks Thursday, will be selected anywhere from third to seventh in the draft, but most do not expect him to fall past the Knicks, who pick sixth.
